entry.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

entry.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/03/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode and the registries will be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a version upgrade on the registries.

entry.title: [DE/BHS/GRA/WAW/SBG][Databases] - PostgreSQL
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 19, 14:00 - 18:00 UTC

Jan 17, 19:41 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/01/2022 14:00 UTC
End time : 19/01/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Write operations (e.g. create a new user, change a password, create a new cluster, etc.) will be temporarily disabled (~15mn for each region).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade PostgreSQL version.

entry.title: [GRA9][ Compute - Instance] - Openstack Cinder
entry.content:
Jan 18, 10:05 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 18/01/2023 09:45 UTC
End time : 18/01/2023 10:15 UTC
Service status: The Cinder service (it manages volumes) was no longer functional, the customer could not manage his Cinder volumes.
The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
